title: Canada’s racist Prime Minister
author: VD
content_html:
It’s going to be interesting to see how the Left will bend over backwards to explain why they’re not screaming for Justin Trudeau’s resignation now that he’s been caught appearing in blackface. So racist indeed!

UPDATE: But wait, there’s more!
